CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 8, 1957, pg. 3 reads: " "My Boy's Gone" - Mrs. Clara Collins, of 3487 Milwaukee St., mother of seven-year-old James Wilson, killed at Bryn Mawr Rd. and Camp St., Tuesday, when hit by a car driven by George (Kelly) Mosby, 3157 Ewart Dr., sits dejectedly with her remaining son, Norman Jr., at her home, and murmurs about the loss of her elder son by a former marriage. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Clara Collins, holding son Norman Collins Jr., seated in floral chair in home on 3487 Milwaukee Street
